details.description: Get help filling out your tax return, including corrections, deadlines, claiming refunds and general advice about self assessment
details.body:
Help and advice on filling out your tax return, including corrections, deadlines, claiming refunds and general advice about Self Assessment.

Self Assessment Helpline

Telephone: 0845 900 0444
From outside the UK: +44 (0)161 931 9070
Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm

Get information about:

  • tax return deadlines
  • correcting errors on a tax return
  • penalties

details.description: Includes filing, deadlines, pay and tax records
Includes VAT, debt and inheritance tax
Who needs to send a Self Assessment tax return, paying your tax bill, deadlines, penalties and corrections
